original_text: This will happen to the people from Egypt. This will happen to the people from all the countries that do not go up to Jerusalem at that time.
korean_text: 애굽 사람이나 이방 나라 사람이나 초막절을 지키러 올라오지 아니하는 자가 받을 벌이 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: This will happen to the people from Egypt.
This will happen to the people from all the countries
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 모든 나라 사람들에게 일어날 것이다.

sentences.original_text: that do not go up to Jerusalem at that time.
